data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamiński, Marcin Jan (2017): Afrotropical Melambiina: revision of the genus Tragardhus Koch, 1956 and redescription of Pseudemmallus Koch, 1956 (Tenebrionidae: Pedinini). Zootaxa 4347 (1): 71-93, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.1.4|5 occurrences
